[et_pb_section admin_label=”section” fullwidth=”on” specialty=”off” background_color=”#3a3a82″ inner_shadow=”off” parallax=”off” transparent_background=”off” allow_player_pause=”off” parallax_method=”off” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on” make_equal=”off” use_custom_gutter=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_header admin_label=”Fullwidth Header” title=”Sales and Supplies” background_layout=”dark” text_orientation=”left” header_fullscreen=”off” header_scroll_down=”off” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off” content_orientation=”center” image_orientation=”center” custom_button_one=”off” button_one_letter_spacing=”0″ button_one_use_icon=”default” button_one_icon_placement=”right” button_one_on_hover=”on” button_one_letter_spacing_hover=”0″ custom_button_two=”off” button_two_letter_spacing=”0″ button_two_use_icon=”default” button_two_icon_placement=”right” button_two_on_hover=”on” button_two_letter_spacing_hover=”0″] [/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”section” fullwidth=”off” specialty=”on”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″][et_pb_sidebar admin_label=”Sidebar” global_module=”90″ orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” area=”sidebar-1″ remove_border=”off” body_text_color=”#3a3a82″ body_font_size=”17″ saved_tabs=”all”] [/et_pb_sidebar][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ specialty_columns=”3″][et_pb_row_inner admin_label=”row_inner”][et_pb_column_inner type=”4_4″ saved_specialty_column_type=”3_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Because of our affiliations with major dealers and OEMs, we are well-positioned for sales and supplies of computer ICT equipment and accessories in the form of keyboards, mice, flash drives, wireless routers, switches, laptop bags and the like. Our wholesale prices are highly competitive.

We offer sales and supplies of Computers, Desktop and Laptops computers as very competitive prices. We are partners with major OEMs like HP, DELL, Toshiba, Emachine, etc. We also give after sales service of all supplied computers under warranty with very impressive response time.

Our computer sales are open to both walk in clients and corporate clients.



 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column_inner][/et_pb_row_inner][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_section]
